samastha kalapayama ema wasuliyata ada ganu labanne, eksath janapada adhirajyawadaya goliya aadhipathyaya sandaha wu siya abhilashayan saha chinaya ilakka karagena eya militarimaya lesa watalame siya ‚Äúaasiyawata harime‚Äù piliwetha anuyana thathu yatathe ya.

daruwan surakimu jathika wadasatahana yatathe kilinochchi disthrikkaya thula kriyathmaka kirimata niyamitha wyapruthi rasak heta dina aarambha kere.emenma kilinochchi kanagapuram widyalaya wenuwen idikala nawa kridanganaya sisu ayithiyata pawarima, uthuru palathe lama niwasa ha randawum niwasawala rakawaranaya labana daruwanta wada yahapath parisarayak nirmanaya kirima sandaha thoragath lama niwasa ha randawum niwasawala nawikaranaya ha prathisanskarana katayuthu wenuwen prathipadana labadima, aabadha sahitha daruwan adhyapanaya labana uthuru palathe pasal 25 ka, prawesha marga ha anekuth pahasukam sanwardhanayata adala mulya prathipadana labadima, wakugadu roga awadanamen daruwan muda ganima sandaha pirisidu paniya jala pasukam nomathi pawul 1,000kata gruhastha jala perana labadima, purwa lama wiya sanwardhanaya sandaha thoragath pera pasalwalata poth kattala, libadu saha krida upakarana labadima, anarakshithawa diwi gewana daruwan sahitha pawul sandaha mulya aadhara sapayima athulu wadasatahan rasak heta janadhipathithumage pradhanathwayen siduweyi.
